00120 template<class Module> inline 
00121 Module* EventHandler::AddModule(const std::string& name,
00122                                 bool processme,
00123                                 bool registerme)
00124 {
00125   for(std::vector<BaseModule*>::iterator it = _modules.begin(); 
00126       it != _modules.end(); it++){
00127     if( (*it)->GetName() == name && dynamic_cast<Module*>(*it) )
00128       return dynamic_cast<Module*>( *it );
00129   }
00130   //if we get here, this module doesn't exist yet, so add it
00131   BaseModule* newmod = new Module;
00132   newmod->SetName(name);
00133   AddModule(newmod, processme, registerme);
00134   return dynamic_cast<Module*>( newmod );
00135 }
00136 
00137 template<class Module> inline 
00138 Module* EventHandler::GetModule(const std::string& name)
00139 {
00140   for(std::vector<BaseModule*>::iterator it = _modules.begin(); 
00141       it != _modules.end(); it++){
00142     if( (*it)->GetName() == name && dynamic_cast<Module*>(*it) )
00143       return dynamic_cast<Module*>( *it );
00144   }
00145   //if we get here, this module doesn't exist yet
00146   return 0;
00147 }
